Fully customizable code component that allows you to spin up a search field with search result that will auto populate as you type.

1. copy code from the â€œsearcherâ€ component 
2. create a new code component, name â€œMySearcherâ€(any name you want)
3. paste in code from the â€œsearcherâ€ component 
4. in the code, replace variable name â€œsearcherâ€ with â€œMysearcherâ€.
5. Now you can configure data or styling, anything you want
